question: What is the location of the Gyeongju City Hall in Gyeongju, South Korea?
asked_question_translated: Qual é a localização da Câmara Municipal de Gyeongju em Gyeongju, Coreia do Sul?
answer: A Câmara Municipal de Gyeongju está localizada no bairro de Dongcheon-dong em Gyeongju, Coreia do Sul.
answer_translated_eng: Gyeongju City Hall is located in the Dongcheon-dong neighbourhood of Gyeongju, South Korea.
